pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/smidm/shape.svg?branch=main)](https://travis-ci.com/smidm/shape)`shape` is a Python package for 2D shapes handling.# Features- objects: - abstract shape - point - polygon - bounding box - rotated bounding box - ellipse- relations: intersection, closeness- manipulation: move and rotate- visualization using matplotlib# Installation`pip install shape`# DocumentationSee tests for now.# Alternativeshttps://github.com/varunagrawal/bbox- bounding box only- lightweighthttps://github.com/shapely/shapely- complex- based on C++ GEOS library
